name: Jigger and Duff
description:
A short adventure between a hero and his companion Jigger.

Game made for the GDevelop Game Jam #2

PLAY ON LILUO

by André Holtz and Willian Holtz

CONTROLS

  • WASD/ARROWS: Move Hero
  • Z/LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Attack
  • X/SPACE: Call Jigger to follow you
  • R: Change camera between Jigger and Duff 
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: Move Jigger to a point or interact
